amendment.description: To strike a reference to the 2007 Free Trade Agreement and to add environmental protection to the list of bilateral goals that should be addressed by the United States and the Republic of Korea.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3880 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3880 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR 12/18/2007 S15936; text: CR 12/18/2007 S15936) To strike a reference to the 2007 Free Trade Agreement and to add environmental protection to the list of bilateral goals that should be addressed by the United States and the Republic of Korea.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3880 proposed by Senator Pryor for Senator Biden.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3880 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
